name: Connect 4 Dots Puzzle Game
description:
There’s no limit to play - just connect dots, earn points, beat highscores and train your brain!

Share your best score via Apple GameCenter.
Connect 4 Features:
SIMPLE AND FUN PUZZLE GAMEPLAY
• Rotate and Place 2 Dots into the grid to connect 4
• The puzzle's visuals freshen up between gameplays

NO STRESS
• Unlimited Continues and no time limits
• No IAP; completely free
• Internet Connection NEVER required!

USE YOUR SPACE
• Don't get stuck. Merge your Dots Carefully!

Solve our puzzle using easy controls and rules:
1. Drag and drop two dots to place on the board
2. Tap on two dots to rotate
3. You can't change your mind after move. Choose wisely!
4. Match one color in a row or block (4 dots or more) and this formation will disappear. Match 9 for a bonus

Having any problems? Any suggestions? We would love to hear from you! email us at C4-help@indiegamemail.com

PLEASE NOTE! Connect 4 Dots is completely free without nine IAP. We are a small independent development company and we love puzzles!
